description: The web is slowly becoming more capable however the experiences it provides still generally fall far behind what native applications are already doing. I want to take a look at how offline architectures can help bring the best experiences to your users and discuss the technologies, from appcache and service workers to PouchDB that will help you build the native web.

title: The Native Web
